summary: If you adopt Runa and Francois , they wont have another family's surname .
descriptionHtml:
I adopted Runa and Francois and they have another surname so I decided to remove their surname . If you have the sameÂ inconvenience then download the mod . Sorry for bad english ^_^

Note : If it dont work restart the game and be sure about that you activated the mod.

Thank you for downloading ...:D
author: NarutoUzumaki061
